text:
XSL provides the element "simple-link" to reference outside documents via URL.
It would be great if it were supported.
creator: bloritsch@apache.org

text:
There is no such animal, despite there being and example in the spec full of 
this element.
Use basic-link for linking internally or externally.
creator: keiron@aftexsw.com
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
